demo.name: brd2601b.demo.sensory_wakeupword
demo.label: Machine Learning - Sensory Wakeup Word Demo

property.value: Machine Learning - Sensory Wakeup Word Demo

properties.value: Capability|Machine\ Learning Device\ Type|SoC MCU|32-bit\ MCU Project\ Difficulty|Beginner

demo.description: This precompiled application demos wakeup word detection using Sensory's TrulyHandsFree (THF) solution on the EFR32xG24 Dev Kit. The application recognizes the spoken phrases "Hello Gecko", "Bye Bye Gecko", "Gecko Red" and "Gecko Green", and recognitions are used to control the on-board LEDs.

demo.name: brd4166a.demo.sensory_wakeupword
demo.label: Machine Learning - Sensory Wakeup Word Demo

properties.value: Capability|Machine\ Learning Device\ Type|SoC MCU|32-bit\ MCU Project\ Difficulty|Beginner

demo.description: This precompiled application demos wakeup word detection using Sensory's TrulyHandsFree (THF) solution on the Thunderboard Sense 2. The application recognizes the spoken phrases "Hello Gecko", "Bye Bye Gecko", "Gecko Red" and "Gecko Green", and recognitions are used to control the on-board LEDs.

demo.name: brd2601b.demo.people_flow_counter_mlx90640
demo.label: Machine Learning - People Flow Counter

properties.value: Capability|Machine\ Learning Device\ Type|SoC MCU|32-bit\ MCU Project\ Difficulty|Beginner

demo.description: A demo displaying how xG24-DK2601B can be used to to gain information about people flow using an IR camera.
